safetyTips: Non contact collections, social distancing measures are in place around the shop.
name: PERRY COURT FARM
address: Canterbury Road, Wye, Ashford, Kent, TN25 4ES
description: Family run Farm Shop, Tearoom and Farmers Markets. Delivering locally for those who are unable to leave their homes and offering a non contact pre paid collection service from the side of the farm shop.  We are also now doing takeaway afternoon teas. Order online or by email.
